B Medical Systems 的太阳能直接疫苗冰箱和冰袋冷冻机 TCW40SDD 获得 ACT 标签医疗冷链行业的领先企业 B Medical Systems 自豪地宣布，其太阳能直驱疫苗冰箱和冰袋冷冻机 TCW40SDD 已获得 My Green Lab 著名的 ACT 标签。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/B-Medical-Systemse28099-Solar-Direct-Vaccine-Refrigerator-and-Ice-Pack-Freezer-the-TCW40SDD-Receives-the-ACT-标签。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/B-Medical-Systemse28099-Solar-Direct-Vaccine-Refrigerator-and-Ice-Pack-Freezer-the-TCW40SDD-Receives-the-ACT-标签。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4263b105-98f8-4e2a-9307-07f921b9addc Thu, 18 Apr 2024 08:27:00 -0400 B Medical Systems’ Solar Direct Vaccine Refrigerator and Ice-Pack Freezer, the TCW40SDD, Receives the ACT Label

研究发现，季节性流感导致学校大量停课，尤其是在南部各州研究调查了 2011 年至 2022 年间美国学校因 11 个流感季节而关闭的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Seasonal-influenza-triggers-significant-school-closures-special-in-southern-states-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240418/Seasonal-influenza-triggers-significant-school-closures-special-in-southern-states-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8f03977-f519-42a1-ac52-697f49154e4a Thu, 18 Apr 2024 06:41:00 -0400 Seasonal influenza triggers significant school closures, especially in southern states, study finds
